task: Check the LiPo battery, camera, RC and laptop are fully charged at the beginning of test
The test setup shall include a fully assembled drone, LiPo battery, Dynamic stand and the Clamp of exact size for the model
Securely clamp the drone frame to the dynamic stand or plate using industrial clamps or fixtures that prevent fly away of drone
Ensure no propeller is connected during the initial dry test run
Place the dynamic stand in the center of a clear area with at least 5 meters radius and ensure no overhead obstacles.
Wear protective gear, including gloves, helmet, and eye protection
Connect the battery, and ensure all components are properly connected and powered
Perform initial system checks: sensor calibration status, battery health, GPS lock, EKF status, RC control signal
Perform a dry run by arming the drone without propellers, check the vibration, motor emergency stop, motor spin directions
Attach the propeller and connect the battery, keep a safe distance and turn on  the recorder on screen ans camera
Arm the motor and keep it in spin and check for the motor spin direction clearly and ensure it is mounted correctly
Rise the throttle slowly untill it starts takoff and holds by the clamp
After takeoff slowly give the roll, pitch, and yaw movement and observe the drone stability
Disarm by slowly reducing the throtlle and land it back on the Plate
Once disarmed stop the recordings, and battery
Inspect the drone and ensure no damage and cleanit and end the trail
